product_desc:
Walk the Night: Personalized, curated and terribly addictive.
This big-data-driven, curated events platform brings real-life events into the connected world of Life 2.0. Gamification and the Hook Model are leveraged to attract and retain users, rapidly building up
taste profiles.

The Walk the Night app and web presence combine matching algorithms using social networks and geolocation, hand-curated events promotion and tools for event organizers with a fast, cutting-edge
ticket payment gateway including Bitcoin support. 

Walk the Night's technology approach can be adapted for use within any client-facing industry.

Ultimately, the WTN algorithm and process can be used for countless businesses outside of the nightlife industries. Imagine finding a health practitioner or apartment with a swipe of the finger, conferences and festivals where you easily find the people you want to talk to, or a fashion week where you can seamlessly find after-parties and RSVP with a single gesture.
name: Walk the Night
